full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 35 of 262 1740 LC8VMAX2 Shawn - direct 1 A. Good morning. 2 Q. Would you please make sure the microphone is close to your mouth so that everyone can hear you. 3 A. Can you hear me clearly? 4 Q. Yes. Thank you. 5 A. All right. 6 Q. Would you please state and spell your first name for us. 7 A. Yeah. Shawn, S-H-A-W-N. 8 Q. Shawn, I'd like to ask you to turn in the binder that is in front of you to what's been already admitted in evidence as Government Exhibit 20. 9 MS. COMEY: And, your Honor, I'd ask for permission for the jurors to do the same in their binders. 10 THE COURT: Okay. Ms. Sternheim, without objection? 11 MS. STERNHEIM: No objection. 12 THE COURT: GX-20, please, members of the jury. That's in the large binder; correct? 13 MS. COMEY: Yes, your Honor. 14 BY MS. COMEY: 15 Q. Shawn, what is Government Exhibit 20? 16 A. A copy of my ID. 17 Q. And is your full name on this exhibit? 18 A. It is. 19 Q. We can set that aside. Thank you very much. Shawn, how old are you? 20 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013313
